lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Gala
[00:01.000] 作词 : Gala
[00:35.890]sunday's coming I wanna drive my car
[00:39.110]to your apartment with present like a star
[00:43.000]forecaster said the weather may be rainy hard
[00:47.060]but I know the sun will shine for us
[00:51.460]oh lazy seagull fly me from the dark
[00:55.220]I dress my jeans and feed my monkey banana
[00:59.050]then I think my age how old,skyline how far
[01:03.580]or we need each other in california
[01:07.660]you show me your body before night comes down
[01:11.200]I touch your face and promise to stay ever young
[01:15.470]on this ivory beach we kissed so long
[01:19.320]it seems that the passion's never gone
[01:23.550]you sing me your melody and I feel so please
[01:27.330]I want you to want me to keep your dream
[01:31.470]together we'll run wild by a summer symphony
[01:35.560]this is what we enjoyed not a fantasy
[01:55.370]the tin-man's surfing I wanna try my luck
[01:59.050]to the top of tide rip like just have some drugs
[02:03.070]I know you have no blame for my proud moonish heart
[02:07.000]Welcome to the golden beatnik park
[02:11.740]oh diamond seashore drag me from the yard
[02:15.240]incredible sunward I watch as you're in photograph
[02:19.080]for camera your smile's so sweet,palm trees' so lush
[02:23.620]would you believe my honey it's califonia
[02:27.270]you show me your body before night comes down
[02:31.470]I touch your face and promise to stay ever young
[02:35.450]on this ivory beach we kissed so long
[02:39.460]it seems that the passion's never gone
[02:43.660]you sing me your melody and I feel so please
[02:47.440]I want you to want me to keep your dream
[02:51.490]together we'll run wild by a summer symphony
[02:55.840]this is what we enjoyed not a fantasy
tlyric:
[by:大评论家]
[00:35.890]星期天啊，我想开着我的座驾
[00:39.110]像大明星一样带着礼物来到你家
[00:43.000]天气预报说今天可能雨很大
[00:47.060]但我坚信阳光会为你我洒
[00:51.460]黄昏中飞来一只慵懒的海鸟
[00:55.220]我穿上牛仔裤给猴哥喂一点儿香蕉
[00:59.050]然后思考：我有多老，天有多高？
[01:03.580]还是你我更该去加利福利亚
[01:07.660]夜晚来临之时，你展示妖娆的身段儿
[01:11.200]我摸着你小脸儿，答应永远年轻有范儿
[01:15.470]在象牙色的海滩我们拥吻不断
[01:19.320]如同激情永远不说再见
[01:23.550]你对我哼着小曲儿，我也相当的惬意
[01:27.330]我感觉你想，让我继续留在你梦里
[01:31.470]夏季的交响乐里我们撒欢儿淘气
[01:35.560]这就是真实发生而不是一场游戏
[01:55.370]看他们冲浪，我也想玩儿一下心跳
[01:59.050]直冲浪尖的感觉如同在嗑药
[02:03.070]我知道你不怪我抓狂又特别孤傲
[02:07.000]在这黄金乐园，我们已经垮掉
[02:11.740]哦，钻石般海滩将我拖出后院
[02:15.240]阳光下的画卷，你竟融化在我眼前
[02:19.080]你对镜头笑很甜，棕榈树也很炫
[02:23.620]亲爱的，这就是加州，你信吗？我的天！
[02:27.270]夜晚来临之时，你展示妖娆的身段儿
[02:31.470]我摸着你小脸儿，答应永远年轻有范儿
[02:35.450]在象牙色的海滩我们拥吻不断
[02:39.460]如同激情永远不说再见
[02:43.660]你对我哼着小曲儿，我也相当的惬意
[02:47.440]我感觉你想，让我继续留在你梦里
[02:51.490]夏季的交响乐里我们撒欢儿淘气
[02:55.840]这就是真实发生而不是一场游戏
